ns:common.document.text:
Four generation CASE tools are CASE Tools which give aid and assistance to work which for generation languages.
The FournGen CASE Tools means Four Generation CASE Tools and it could be understood as a programming by configuration(with the aid of a tool). Four Generation tools are designed to work in specific business areas.
Before people talks about FourGen CASE Tools people talks and works with four generation programming languages. Then after works for a period with such languages vendors created complete environments to give aid and assistance to the developers (the CASE part of the history) and then born the Four Generation CASE Tools. More abut for generation languages could be encountered Fourth-generation_programming_language
There is too a commercial tool called "FourGen" this bring some misunderstanding about the terms.
A list of four generation case tools is still needed on wikipedia.
The FourGen CASE Tools, originally developed in 1983 by FourGen Software Technologies based in Seattle, and bundled with Informix-4GL as I-4GL Forms, I-4GL Menu's until 1996, are the cornerstone of MBD (Modifiability by Design) concept, and provide a Rapid Application Development environment
